unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Collab Craze Continues!**
normalised: social media and influencer marketing colon collab craze continues exclamation

unnormalised: Okay, folks, social media is still buzzing with brand collaborations! Remember that crazy Amul x Netflix partnership during the "Extraction 2" release? That's the kind of stuff we're seeing more and more.
normalised: okay, folks, social media is still buzzing with brand collaborations! remember that crazy Amul by Netflix partnership during the "Extraction two" release question mark that's the kind of stuff we're seeing more and more.

unnormalised: This Diwali season, get ready for a barrage of influencer marketing campaigns. We're hearing rumors of a big Myntra collab with Masaba Gupta, and even local biryani joints in Hyderabad are getting in on the action, teaming up with food bloggers to promote their special Onam-time biryani! Expect tons of Instagram reels and YouTube reviews.
normalised: this Diwali season, get ready for a barrage of influencer marketing campaigns. we're hearing rumors of a big Myntra collab with Masaba Gupta, and even local biryani joints in Hyderabad are getting in on the action, teaming up with food bloggers to promote their special Onam time biryani! expect tons of Instagram reels and YouTube reviews.

unnormalised: Brands are realizing the power of reaching audiences through trusted voices. But be warned: authenticity is key! Nobody wants to see a clearly fake ad. Think more, "Rhea Sharma genuinely enjoying her chai" and less, "forced product placement during a dance routine near Gateway of India."
normalised: brands are realizing the power of reaching audiences through trusted voices. but be warned: authenticity is key! nobody wants to see a clearly fake ad. think more, "Rhea Sharma genuinely enjoying her chai" and less, "forced product placement during a dance routine near Gateway of India."

unnormalised: It's all about building trust, people! And maybe getting a few new followers along the way. Stay tuned for more updates and remember to use #ad responsibly!
